COSMIC DANCE PARTY

with one foot in infinity.

from side to side,
to side to side,
to side.
the points of light
shine lines,
and beams,
and strips,
and streams,
and sheets,
and planes.
until they birth
space filling curves.
that shoot bright white smiles into a multitude of mirror shaded faces
reflecting into a parallel universe where beats are once more brokenâ€¦

this is a cosmic dance party.
